content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Munich, I propose a rental price of €900 per month. This price includes all utilities and other expenses. Is this a price that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I agree to the price of €900 per month. Thank you for your help.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great, I'm glad to hear that you agree to the price. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns before we sign the rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you again. I will let you know if I have any other questions.
Have a good day.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you, you too. Have a good day!
name: Heinrich Heine
